12:52 <sdumitriu1> For PhenoTips 12:59 <kushalkhandelwal> Me :P 12:59 <sdumitriu1> Except you 12:59 <kushalkhandelwal> :D 13:18 <ravigarg27> i would try to!! 13:21 <sdumitriu1> OK ravigarg27 13:21 <sdumitriu1> It's this one: https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues/408 13:22 <sdumitriu1> Don't hesitate to ask me any questions you might have 13:27 <ravigarg27> ok so how should I start 13:28 <sdumitriu1> First, you did build and run phenotips locally, right? 13:28 <ravigarg27> yup 13:28 <sdumitriu1> OK, now find out where are these categories defined 13:29 <ravigarg27> k 13:29 <ravigarg27> will be back just a minute 13:29 <sdumitriu1> Search for "Cognition and Development" 13:31 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:34 <ravigarg27> sry sdumitriu, had to reboot was in windows before 13:35 <sdumitriu1> Search for "Cognition and Development" 13:36 <ravigarg27> on the new patient record page? 13:37 <sdumitriu1> No, in the sources, or in the app through http://localhost:8080/bin/Main/Search 13:38 <ravigarg27> ok searched 13:39 <ravigarg27> getting some 7 results 13:40 <sdumitriu1> OK, now see if you can find out how to change the category 13:41 <ravigarg27> yeah looking into that 13:43 <froggy> has joined #ccm 14:24 <alex_____> has joined #ccm 14:26 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 14:27 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:30 <camelia_> has joined #ccm 14:32 <sdumitriu1> Hey camelia_ 14:32 <sdumitriu1> That's a pretty long application 14:32 <sdumitriu1> Still reading on it 14:33 <sdumitriu1> One thing, though, it's "phenotype", not "phenotip", when talking about patients 14:33 <Krinye> has joined #ccm 14:33 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 14:33 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:33 <camelia_> ok, Thank You! 14:37 <qwebirc78499> has joined #ccm 14:38 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:43 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:50 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 15:04 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:05 <ravi_> has joined #ccm 15:10 <ravi_> has joined #ccm 15:14 <ravi_> has joined #ccm 15:20 <ravi_> has joined #ccm 15:24 <ravi_> has joined #ccm 15:29 <ravi_> has joined #ccm 15:33 <ravi_> has joined #ccm 15:39 <ravi_> has joined #ccm 16:01 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 22:25 <froggy> has joined #ccm
